title: GNOME 3.18 Supports the $9 C.H.I.P. Linux Computer, Windows Tablets, More
text: Now that GNOME 3.18 has been released, and the developers behind the GNOME Project and GNOME Foundation non-profit organization have already started planning the next major release of the widely used desktop environment. Renowned GNOME developer Bastien Nocera, known for being involved in projects like Totem, GNOME Bluetooth... Â»
